text.div:
SegmentORCtoProvenance (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/v2mappings/segment-orc-to-provenance)

Mapping from ORC to Provenance

ACTIVE (not intended for production usage). Published on 2022-02-21 by HL7 International, Inc (HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup: http://hl7.org/Special/committ..., Keith W. Boone: kboone@ainq.com). Copyright (c) 2020, HL7 International, Inc., All Rights Reserved.

This ConceptMap represents a mapping from the HL7 V2 Segment ORC to the FHIR Provenance Resource.


Source Concept DetailsRelationshipDestination Concept Details
Code from Code from Code from Code from Code from
ORC-1Order Control"CREATE"is equivalent toactivity.coding.codeactivity.coding.codeIF ORC-1 EQUALS "NW"
ORC-1Order Control"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-DataOperation"is equivalent toactivity.coding.systemactivity.coding.systemIF ORC-1 EQUALS "NW"
ORC-1Order Control"UPDATE"is equivalent toactivity.coding.codeactivity.coding.codeIF ORC-1 EQUALS "SC"
ORC-1Order Control"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-DataOperation"is equivalent toactivity.coding.systemactivity.coding.systemIF ORC-1 EQUALS "SC"
ORC-1Order Control"CANCEL"is equivalent toactivity.coding.codeactivity.coding.codeIF ORC-1 IN ("OC", "CA")
ORC-1Order Control"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-DataOperation"is equivalent toactivity.coding.systemactivity.coding.systemIF ORC-1 IN ("OC", "CA")
ORC-9Date/Time of Transactionis equivalent torecordedrecorded
ORC-9Date/Time of Transactionis equivalent tooccurredDateTimeoccurredDateTime
ORC-10Entered ByXCN[Practitioner]is equivalent toagent[1].who(Practitioner)agent[1].who(Practitioner)
ORC-10Entered By"enterer"is equivalent toagent[1].type.coding.codeagent[1].type.coding.code
ORC-10Entered By"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/provenance-participant-type"is equivalent toagent[1].type.coding.systemagent[1].type.coding.system
ORC-11Verified ByXCN[Practitioner]is equivalent toagent[2].who(Practitioner)agent[2].who(Practitioner)
ORC-11Verified By"verifier"is equivalent toagent[2].type.coding.codeagent[2].type.coding.code
ORC-11Verified By"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/provenance-participant-type"is equivalent toagent[2].type.coding.systemagent[2].type.coding.system
ORC-12Ordering ProviderXCN[Practitioner]is equivalent toagent[3].who(Practitioner)agent[3].who(Practitioner)
ORC-12Ordering Provider"author"is equivalent toagent[3].type.coding.codeagent[3].type.coding.code
ORC-12Ordering Provider"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/provenance-participant-type"is equivalent toagent[3].type.coding.systemagent[3].type.coding.system
ORC-17Entering OrganizationCWE[Organization]is equivalent toagent[1].onBehalfOf(Organization)agent[1].onBehalfOf(Organization)
ORC-18Entering DeviceCWE[Device]is equivalent toagent[5].who(Device)agent[5].who(Device)
ORC-19Action By"performer"is equivalent toagent[4].type.coding.codeagent[4].type.coding.code
ORC-19Action By"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/provenance-participant-type"is equivalent toagent[4].type.coding.systemagent[4].type.coding.system
ORC-19Action ByXCN[Practitioner]is equivalent toagent[4].who(Practitioner)agent[4].who(Practitioner)
ORC-21Ordering Facility NameXON[Location]is equivalent tolocation(Location[1])location(Location[1])
ORC-22Ordering Facility AddressXAD[Address]is equivalent tolocation(Location[1].address)location(Location[1].address)
ORC-23Ordering Facility Phone NumberXTN[ContactPoint]is equivalent tolocation(Location[1].telecom)location(Location[1].telecom)
ORC-24Ordering Provider AddressXAD[Address]is equivalent toagent[3].who(Practitioner.address)agent[3].who(Practitioner.address)

description: This ConceptMap represents a mapping from the HL7 V2 Segment ORC to the FHIR Provenance Resource.
